title: Hey Everyone if someone could answer this it would be great
body:
I currently live in california and I am getting 83 ping with server change consistently. I use to get 53. I have ATT which is my ISP now theres no agreement yet but when they do will it help my ping?? if so how much am i looking at do you think?

If not what can i do to get better ping as in switching isps would help?

I am not mad just want to see what i can do. I think its great everyone can play now! Looking forward to seeing you guys on the rift! hopefully on my team though!

replies.body:
I would play through the Ping as of right now (Give it about a month), as it seems to be a little messy and things have yet to stabilize (I was getting 48 ping with the server change, but now it's more toward 73 only days later). 

Once it has stabilized, you'll have a better idea where your ping is at (Who knows? Maybe you won't have to do anything).  You will also know to expect if you switched ISP's (Switching ISP's can sometimes help, but it's good to know what you are getting into beforehand).
